title: Gallery: The BWR California Winning Bikes of Matt Beers and Sofia Gomez Villafañe
content:
One race, two different approaches to bike choice. BWR CA continues to be one of the hardest off-road races to choose equipment for.

Read the full article at Gallery: The BWR California Winning Bikes of Matt Beers and Sofia Gomez Villafañe on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
